author: rooneg
msg: Make the ChangeControlParser work on 1.4 JVMs.
(select): Use String.replaceAll, not String.replace, since replaceAll

author: jstrachan
msg: minor refactor introducing ServiceMixComponent to be the API offered by ServiceMix-enhanced JBI components. Added a new base class, DefaultComponent which merges the Component and Lifecycle APIs together into one simple API which also supports configuring a collection of Endpoints on startup along with the associated ServiceUnit. So now a well behaved component only has to extend DefaultComponent and provide an Endpoint implementation

author: jboynes
msg: create tag directories for parent pom and buildtools
